channel.title: Post funny stuff please read first post
channel.description:
ok post a funny item off of mopar or something funny you found on a clean site and no spam or you will be reported and if you only want to reply to a post...find something funny first please then post your reply and your funny item...
P.S. wowomg.com is not a clean site so please dont post anything like it or a porn site...(for the kids under-age, if their parents look at this site and find a bad website link the kid could be banned so dont do it it may be a great scripter)
[b]ok, ill start[/b]
[quote="Gotta Catch Them All, post:39, topic:32391"]I love Erj <3 <3[/quote] [quote="Yz85Racer, post:40, topic:32391"]What that means; I wish to make-love to Erj through a series of steps[/quote]
